description: Create, start, stop and delete servers on the cloudscale.ch IaaS service.

anti_affinity_with.description: UUID of another server to create an anti-affinity group with

use_public_network.description: Attach a public network interface to the server

image.description: Image used to create the server

user_data.description: Cloud-init configuration (cloud-config) data to use for the server.

bulk_volume_size_gb.description: Size of the bulk storage volume in GB

volume_size_gb.description: Size of the root volume in GB

use_private_network.description: Attach a private network interface to the server

use_ipv6.description: Enable IPv6 on the public network interface
